summary: Defines the framework and concrete strategy plugins that drive how Ansible executes playbooks, offering core utilities for task coordination, host management, result processing and cleanup, and implementing linear, free, host‑pinned and debug execution models.
business_intent: Provide extensible execution strategies to allow Ansible users to run playbooks in different modes—sequential, parallel, host‑specific or simulated/debug—thereby improving flexibility, performance, and troubleshooting capabilities.
